text: The following lists events that happened during 2010 in the Democratic Republic of the Congo. == Incumbents == * President: Joseph Kabila * Prime Minister: Adolphe Muzito ==Events== ===January=== * January 3 - Mount Nyamuragira erupts, threatening rare wildlife in the Virunga National Park. ==References== Category:Years of the 21st century in the Democratic Republic of the Congo Democratic Republic of the Congo Category:2010s in the Democratic Republic of the Congo Democratic Republic of the Congo
title: 2010 in the Democratic Republic of the Congo
